step_1_basic_info_content: Enter the school name, unit name, and teachers contributing to the plan creation, and select the MYP year program, academic year, and subject.
step_3_lesson_count: the number of lessons in the subtopic
step_3_prior_knowledge: the knowledge that the student must have before starting to learn the subtopic
step_3_prior_skills: the learning skills that the student must have before starting to learn the subtopic
step_3_new_terms: new terms that the student will learn in this subtopic
step_3_conceptual_procedural: conceptual understandings and procedural skills that the student will acquire while learning in this subtopic
step_3_success_criteria: Success criteria by which the student will be able to predict their success in this subtopic.
step_4_select_specified: Select specified concepts from the subject's available concept list that match the defined content
step_4_conceptual_understanding: Define what students will understand through the selected concepts
step_4_global_context: Select an expanded global context that matches the defined content, selected concepts, and defined conceptual understanding
step_4_context_exploration: Explain how the selected global context will be explored in this unit
step_4_inquiry_statement: Define the inquiry statement or question
step_4_questions: Define factual knowledge, conceptual, and debatable questions
step_5_select_objectives: Select the assessment objectives that will be applied in this unit
step_5_assessment_inquiry: Describe the relationship between the summative assessment and the inquiry statement or question
step_5_command_terms: Specify the command terms that will be used in assessments for this unit.
step_5_contexts: Define possible individual, local, and global contexts explored in this unit
step_6_select_atl: Select the Approaches to Learning (ATL) that will be developed in this unit
step_6_describe_atl: Describe how you will develop the selected approach to learning in this unit
step_10_review_save: Review the created plan and save it in the selected formats
